items.heading: Installation party
items.description: Bring your laptop if you can, so we can install Ruby on Rails for you. This is an open block of time so drop in whenever is good for you.  You'll get to meet coaches and fellow Rails Girls!

items.heading: Registration, Breakfast/Coffee & Installation Fest
items.description: During the morning, weâ€™ll install Ruby on Rails on your computer while enjoying coffee and breakfast.

items.heading: Welcome
items.description: We will talk about the day and get a word from our sponsors.

items.heading: Introduction: The Web as a Restaurant
items.description: Let's learn about what really happens when we type in a web address.

items.heading: Workshop: Let's get coding!
items.description: We will break into small groups and jumpstart your first web application!

items.heading: De-coding Websites
items.description: Let's dig a little deeper and understand what's behind the magic of big web apps!

items.heading: Workshop: Keep building and exploring!
items.description:
Finish up the starter app and then explore different ways of customizing your web app on the Exploration! page.
Ask your coach for any additional guidance you may need at this time.

items.heading: A very Rails Girls dinner!
items.description: Hang out and have dinner with us in Rice Village!
